Key Match Events: Anastasios Bakasetas scored in the 48th minute
Petros Mantalos scored in the 90'+1 minute
Post-Match Reflections: Greece extended their perfect Nations League campaign with a 2-0 home win over Ireland on Sunday, their fourth victory coming thanks to second-half goals from Anastasios Bakasetas and Petros Mantalas on an emotional night
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Georgios Karaiskakis Stadium in Piraeus, Greece, with an attendance of 30,253
Others: The second half of the match saw a missed attempt by Mikey Johnston of Republic of Ireland in the 90'+4 minute
